properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:09PM CST until January 26 at 9:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Mississippi River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark
* from Thursday January 16 until Saturday January 25.
* At 11 AM Friday the stage was...39.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 45.0 feet on Monday January 20.
* Flood stage is 41.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday January 16 and
continue to rise to near 45.0 feet by Monday January 20. The river
will fall below flood stage by Saturday January 25.
At 45.0 feet, In Mississippi, boat launch parking lot at Charlie's
Camp is covered. Campbell Road in is partly flooded. Northeast end of
Betty Lane is going under. Part of Bourbon Street is flooded.
Spoonbill Lane is going under water. Valley Lane is flooded in
Lakeview Camp. Road to houses south of Ship Island is being covered..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
